name: Hevel Isle (Demo)
description:
Inspired by the book of Ecclesiastes and the old dungeons of the Legend of Zelda series, Hevel Isle aims to replicate and explore the feelings of tension and mystery that comes from delving into the unknown. In this treasure-hunting thriller, you will navigate maze-like temples, castles, and the hostile wilderness, where traps and treasure lie around every corner. Can you escape the deadly world of Hevel Isle?

The game is currently in development, and feedback is always appreciated! If all goes well, then I expect the full game to be released sometime in 2023.
